vsParam:
Ah, you guys. Perfect timing!
I have a favor to ask of you, may I?

I want you to gather some ingredients for my
next potion class.

I'm really busy right now.
Would you do this for me?

Thank you! Ahhh, you are so reliable...
I'm so happy!

Ho ho, of course!
Just do the work and you'll be rewarded, [px].

"Never forget to confirm the remuneration when undertaking
a commission". You did it well. I'm so happy!

Ha-ha, we haven't done anything yet, and we just got a
compliment. Marjoram Sensei loves students too much...

Uh? The ingredient in your hand,
will you use it in the next lesson?

Yes, I will. I want to add something new
to my teaching.

I bet everyone will enjoy the lesson...
And have a good time. Because...

Ho ho. I can't wait to give the lesson to watch
the expression on everyone's face!

Uh? Uh? What, what is it!?
I'm intrigued...
Well... I'll reveal the mystery in class.

Boohoo, I'm so curious...
A-anyway, let's go gather ingredients first, [px]!

Marjoram Sensei, we have brought
the materials you asked!

Wow, thank you!
Now we can have the lesson properly.

It's a rare chance. Why don't you take my lesson too?
I'm sure you are curious about what this lesson will be like, right?

Let's start today's potion class.
Today, we are going to...

S-Sensei, are you serious?
Are we really going to make cookies?

Yep. I've given out the recipe
to make cookies. But...

The cookies will have the same effect as potions. Look
at the ingredients and steps carefully. I believe you can tell that, no?

Ah... Really. Following this recipe, the cookies we make
will have the effect of potions!

Yes. Today's lesson will be both interesting and delicious.
Great, let's all get started ♪

I believe the cookies will pair well with a nice cup of tea.
That's when you can confirm its effect.

I see. Although it's kind of unexpected...
Such a class seems pretty nice.

Yes, I really look forward to the cookies!
OK, let's start making them, [px]!
